caption: Truly enjoyed the restaurant and the atmosphere. Lots of flavor and great wine. We will definitely go again in the future.
We miss you Nello!  It’s just not same fabulous food that you made!

Limited Northern Italian menu but exceptional quality. We came here at the recommendation of a neighbor who lived in Greenville for many years and it certainly did not disappoint. Skyler our server did a great job
I love this restaurant. Great food and great staff. One of the top five “real” local restaurants in Greenville
Truly a great restaurant.  Food and service are excellent.  Very probably the best and most genuine Italian food in the Greenville area.

Waited almost 20 minutes to be acknowledged just to be told you must have a reservation. A sign on the door would have been helpful. Crossed the street to Trio and we were quickly seated and had a wonderful experience and meal.
Great service, food was out of this world
Excellent food ❤️
Authentic northern italian place!

This restaurant is my first choice restaurant.  Of all restaurants I know I prefere it most. I never miss an opportunity to go to that place. everytime  I feel like having a good meal, this restaurant comes right away to my mind. splendid …
Food was yummy.

Our waiter Skylar was one of the best we have experienced in a very long time.   His knowledge of the menu, specials and wine pairings was on point.   Will recommend this restaurant to all we know as everyone's dish was considered delicious

Loved it! Nicest staff and owners were super sweet! We were only there for an after dinner dessert and drink and can't wait to come back to try the dinners. The menu looked amazing. Totally made to feel at home and like we were in a small town rather than a city atmosphere!

I like this place! They have awesome dishes, they have a nice menu, The chef in that spot is a real authority in the kitchen, I enjoy a lot trying all their dishes. The food is consistently fresh and tasty, the attitude towards the …

beautiful place, very nice and really impeccable cleanliness. the waiters are very professional and know how to perfectly and accurately explain the menu with its ingredients. In the kitchen we have the chef Mr Nello Gioia, a 100% Bergamo …

Everything was perfect. We will be back again. Loved it.
Last minute booking, food and service were top notch. Thank you,  we will return!
Over priced food just because your in downtown Greenville
Great bar service!!!!
Excellent food and service. Staff was very willing to assist with a food allergy and had multiple options. I would highly recommend!
Scintillating linguine pomodoro!! The moment it touches your tastebuds, you feel transported to the Old World, to one of those romantic villages that dot the Tuscan countryside!!
We had a great dinner. The atmosphere is terrific.
Excellent!. Food was delicious and service was great. Definitely on list to revisit.
Best Italian restaurant in Greenville.

The Mozzarella Di Bufala Alla Caprese Salat was literally only one sliced tomatoe with half a mozzarella ball on a plate.. the Risotto looked like it was eaten before and the rice was extremely undercooked. Our waitress didn’t care to …

I know what I'm talking about when it comes to Italian food (I was born and raised in Italy, and I cook Italian myself). Bergamo is a very nice surprise for an Italian restaurant in South Carolina. Very friendly and nice service, …

Fall for Greenville in for a drink at the bar. Carrie the bartender is doing nothing to get anyone to return. Too busy guarding the bathroom to concentrate on her customer service. Limited menu and rather high prices but it is prime Main …
Great pas8 and atmosphere
Always amazing great food awesome bartender classy and comfortable
Cozy with lots of attention to detail.

Lots of people love it here but for me one of the most dissapointing meals I have had in Greenville.  I walk by here on a regular basis so tonight rather than going to Tratorria Giorgio I decided to give it a try.  The woman behind the bar …
Excellent authentic Italian!
Excellent menu.  Good, but pricey, wine list.  Superb staff.
Delicious food!!

Although the menu is limited, there are additional specials and they are very well prepared. It's a Northern Italian restaurant, however the red sauce is something Southern Italians will enjoy. Wonderful ambiance, feels like being in Italy. Waitstaff is helpful and attentive.
Somewhat limited menu, but the food is excellent, and the desserts are spectacular! Definitely worth a try.
My wife and stopped by on a week night so it was nice and quiet, the service was good and the food was excellent.

Me and my friend were casually strolling downtown Greenville and decided to stop for a bite to eat. Being that we pass by the restaurant everytime while walking, we decided to give it a try. When we walked in, we stood there and waited …
Very nice place to eat

Best meal I have had in Greenville. From the moment we walked in to the moment we left, everything was perfect. 4 different dishes. Everyone was happy. Antipasto to desert. Definitely will return again and again. If I could give it 6 stars, …

Incredible evening with good friends at this restaurant. Our first time and we will return. Lovely intimate atmosphere, great service and help with placing our order and the meal and dessert were exceptional. It is nice to have authentic …
If you want authentic chef driven Italian food then you must try it. Locally owned and operated

This place is a hidden gem in plain sight. every time I go I've noticed the crowd is always older people, usually those in retirement, but my wife and I have been there several times and the food is simply amazing. Every time we're there, …
The food is wonderful! A very relaxing atmosphere with awesome service. Definitely a wonderful experience! Nello Gioia is one to remember!
Good food and staff
Favorite place while traveling through Greenville.
Amazing Italian food !
Good atmosphere, good service, good food.
Superior food,  superior service.   One of my favorite places in Downtown Greenville
5 stars until the waiter checked out my mom
Never disappoints!

Fabulous. Don't let the Main St location fool you.  This is not a tourist spot.  Food that rivals the best found in large metropolitan cities.  Better than most actually.  Our reaction to the description of the  specials was "I'm not sure I …
It was great
I felt as though we were transported back to Italy. Regret that it took us so long to find an authentic dining experience in Greenville. Can't wait to return.
Wonderful evening  and Sandra was tops!
Delicious food, great bar service and quiet atmosphere.
Wonderful too, wonderful service. Classic fine dining at it's best.  The carpaccio, the calamari, the veal.chop all of them were wonderful.
Excellent experience!
Great service, great food.
Without a doubt one of the best restaurants in Greenville. Classy, impeccable service and the food just WOW!!!!

We came to this restaurant after not being able to go to other restaurants due to either not making a reservation or really long wait times. We were seated immediately here.  The pros: 1. Great location 2. Reservations not required, …
best chef around. not as expensive as you'd think. a must try in greenville.

Okay now I understand why I should of listened to the other reviews, -1st the menu is VERY LIMITED -2nd  they open at 530pm I got there at 7pm Their special for the night was italian sausage on  fettuccine, "okay perfect I'll take that" …

Absolutely wonderful! There is a reason that this restaurant is still serving Greenville since 1989. My wife and I enjoyed our dinner and learning about the food, wine, and the owner. These people get it.
Overpriced foods served warm. If that's your idea of a great Italian dinner then you will love this place.
Great service!  Always fresh and good food.  One of my favorites!
Quite nice ambience. Decent food. Wonderful waitress, went above and beyond.

Having just returned from Bergamo, Italy, I can say with confidence this is the real deal for Northern Italian uisine. Knowledgeable & attentive waitstaff, cozy setting, fantastic food. Price point in line for the area. Ask for more details.

Quaint, upscale atmosphere with very friendly and helpful staff. Overall, experience was excellent, but was expecting handmade pasta for this level of "authentic" Italian. I ordered the pomodoro and the sauce was excellent,  but the pasta …
Delicious food, great service, great wine, we have been there only 2 times but every time we come to Greenville is a must. The bartender, Cari, is a lovely person. Food is always spectacular.
The best food in downtown Greenville.
Loved every bite

We had been looking forward to experiencing Bergamo for quite some time. We had been throwing ideas around and decided to walk in without a reservation. No surprise that the didnt have any seating until late, so we asked if we could …

Oh boy... if you like good food and a fair share of insults and judging, come here and make sure Denise is your waitress/bartender.  What a jerk...from the word Go she was rude, judgemental, unattentive and outright condescending. Now, me …

Wonderful food and people
Northern Italian menu.  My favorite in Greenville.  Shhhh.  Keep this a secret.   Waiters have been there for years.  Know the kitchen intimately.
Good food
Wonderful food, excellent Italian wine list.The staff made the evening a lot of fun. They really know how to make you feel at home.

I eat here 2 to 3 times a month and Chef Nello always delivers amazingly fresh and expertly prepared food and his homeade lemoncello is the best you will ever have.  The bartender Keri and the waiter Scott complement the whole experience with flawless and freindly service.
Fresh food. Authentic Italian. Locally owned.
On a Speacial day 11/10/2015 I walked out after been treated rudely by the waitress.  I will never return or recommend this restaurant!
I've been going to Nello's place for many many years. If you want really good food, this is it.

I can't tell you much about the food, but I can tell you they have some lousy business practices. I called to make a reservation nearly a week before. The message said to leave information for your reservation. I did so. The next few days …

My wife and I have been coming here for 10 years and chef Nello has never disappointed  Update 2013: last couple of times we have been here, the service has been lacking, so I had to downgrade service.  Food still excellent as ever
Portions were small, although high quality.
My husband and I love Ristorante Bergamo.  Excellent Northern Italian food.  Its an eating experience and a must.
